## Clickable type

Types of objects that can be used in a player click prompt.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type Clickable = GameObject | Button;
```
**References:** [GameObject](./bge-core.gameobject.md)<!-- -->, [Button](./bge-core.button.md)
